articles.author: Jenipher Camino Gonzalez
articles.title: Trump says South Korea can build nuclear-powered submarine - DW
articles.description: Nuclear submarine technology is among the most sensitive and highly guarded technologies in the United States. President Donald Trump says South Korea can build the vessel in Philadelphia.
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump said on Thursday that he has granted South Korea the approval to to build a nuclear-powered submarine in the United States.
The remarks come as Trump is in South Korea, whe… [+1377 chars]

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Grammarly rebrands to ‘Superhuman,’ launches a new AI assistant - TechCrunch
articles.description: Grammarly is renaming itself as Superhuman, after acquiring Superhuman email client in July
articles.content: Typically, when a company acquires another, it will absorb the new company’s branding or integrate it with its own identity. Grammarly is doing something different: After acquiring email client Super… [+2217 chars]
